wikitext.*:
'''Pickthorn''' was the surname of a family of [[Men of Bree|Bree-men]].<ref>{{RK|Homeward}}</ref> "Little Tom Pickthorn from over the Hill" was one of the three Men of Bree killed fighting ruffians during the winter of 1418-1419.
